name: Nova Star Course Project
description:
This game is intended to be played at full screen on desktop, Move with WASD, Shoot with Space, you can pause the game with 'P'.

Enjoy shooting waves of unique spaceships that are trying to destroy you and try to survive to the final boss while listening to intense music.

TIPS

If you pick a power up, you will restore a small amount of health and upgrade your weapon.

The fastest weapon is the "Ray", but the "Orb" deals more damage.

The higher your weapon upgrade is the less damage enemies deal you, but if they hit you, you will go back to the first weapon meaning that you will receive even more damage in the next hit.

: )

The music and audio for this game was obtained at opengameart.org and the rest of the assets come from GDHQ File base.
